title: 97B.085 USING RADIOS TO TAKE ANIMALS.
text:
A person may not use radio equipment to take big game or small game.
A person may use radio equipment to take unprotected wild animals.
This section does not prohibit the use of:
(1) radio communication between a handler and a dog;
(2) a remote-controlled animal noise caller for taking crows, fur-bearing animals, and unprotected animals; or
(3) a remote-controlled motorized decoy used for taking migratory waterfowl under section 97B.811, subdivision 4a, or for taking mourning doves.
